definition: gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms

definition: hell on earth (idiom); suffering the torments of Buddhist hell while still alive/fig. having an uncomfortable time

sentences.english: Red back home, light fire make life.
sentences.chinese: 红色跟着回家，人间烟火。

sentences.english: Legend has it that there was a devil in Dynasty of Dong Han.
sentences.chinese: 相传，在东汉时期有一妖怪为祸人间。

sentences.english: The Passion is a high-end club in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 天上人间是北京一家高端会所。
学校男生宿舍出租，双人间。

sentences.english: A little bit of commercialism can help kids make connections with their peers.
sentences.chinese: 一点点的商业主义能帮助孩子们与同类人间建立联系。

sentences.english: Mayhap a funeral among men is a wedding feast among the angels.
sentences.chinese: 也许人间的葬礼也同时是天使的婚礼。

sentences.english: Fifty human years are equal to one day & night among the Devas of the Four Great Kings.
sentences.chinese: 人间五十年，是四大王天天神的一昼夜。

sentences.english: I afraid we have no vacant suite room, would you mind having a double room?
sentences.chinese: 我们恐怕没有空余的套间了，你介意改定双人间吗？

sentences.english: Countless frustrations all his life made him see the ways of the world.
sentences.chinese: 命运多舛使他看透了人间百态。

sentences.english: Spring is just wonderful world, Jalan poem several times before the wedding day.
sentences.chinese: 妙是人间春正好，佳期几度惹诗才。

sentences.english: World of millenarian the following every, changed the world.
sentences.chinese: 一千年以后的凡世，换了人间。

sentences.english: Let the sky lanterns shine, to illuminate the future, shine with great splendor, blessing the world.
sentences.chinese: 让天灯普照大地，照亮未来，光辉灿烂，降福人间。

sentences.english: I feel like I'm god's gift to the world.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得我就是上天赐给人间的礼物。

sentences.english: From now on all the and beauty, vientiane update.
sentences.chinese: 从此人间一切和美，万象更新。

sentences.english: Gold apt to look for in the world, human world bosom friend difficult to seek.
sentences.chinese: 世界上黄金易找，人间知己难寻。

this life/to lose face/to be disgraced
